message.body: how's your mom?
Eh. Better than this weekend. It's really depressing there tho
Are you there?
I went this morning
do you need anything?
i'm sorry.
No, I'm at school studying for my last final. Thanks tho. Their house just seemed cluttered and dilapidated
houses are like living creatures.
did i tell you how i got hit in the face with my kayak in costa rica?
well, my nose is still sore. then my tooth started hurting. i went to the dentisy
dentist yesterday and he said the tooth was fine but
i may have fractured my sinus bone.
so i'm going to see an ent tmmrw.
Oh no! What do you do for that?
Oh ok
nothing probably. the dentist said that i should get it looked at bc the sinuses are a big deal.
if it was just my nose, i wouldn't bother.
How did it happen?
anyway, it's tapping into a nerve, whatever it is. it hurts and i'm not very hungry.
there was a big wave that came unexpectedly from behind. no one saw it coming.
my kayK was flipped and the wave threw it. it hit my nose and i got stuck underneath.
That's scary. I'm sorry it hurts still.
thanks.
when are you going back to lanc?

I don't know, I'm going to have to talk to my brother, I think we need to plan to go together a few days and clean out some clutter. It was always cluttered but when my mom could clean it just seemed eclectic. Now it seems dangerous
can you guys hire a service?
My step dad can't really help her. He can't hear very well and he has add and barely cares for himself
Maybe. I can't financially help with anything like that tho
i walked by farm yesterday. tim marin glared at me. he has a huge mustache. todd has long hair and was wearing an american flag bandana on his head.
Oh my god, that's gross. I can't say that place has fallen, because it wasn't so great to begin with
